languages.text: "Виноват, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Солдат вытягивается и пытается оправить снаряжение.{/n} "Форма новая, и поскольку стража сейчас в затрудненном положении — выдается часто по остаточному принципу... какие размеры есть, те и дают".

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."
languages.original_text: "Виноват, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Солдат вытягивается и пытается оправить снаряжение.{/n} "Форма новая, и поскольку стража сейчас в затрудненном положении — выдается часто по остаточному принципу... какие размеры есть, те и дают".

traits.locale_text: "Apologies, Your {mf||Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and tries to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform, and since the guards are in a difficult situation right now, we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

"Apologies, Your {mf||Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and tries to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform, and since the guards are in a difficult situation right now, we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

"Apologies, Your {mf||Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

"Apologies, Your {mf||Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf||Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Der Soldat richtet sich auf und zupft seine Uniform zurecht.{/n} "Es ist eine neue Uniform. Die Wachen sind in einer schwierigen Lage, wir bekommen oft einfach zugeteilt, was übrig ist ... und das hat nicht immer die richtige Größe."
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf||Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Der Soldat richtet sich auf und zupft seine Uniform zurecht.{/n} "Es ist eine neue Uniform. Die Wachen sind in einer schwierigen Lage, wir bekommen oft einfach zugeteilt, was übrig ist ... und das hat nicht immer die richtige Größe."

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. {n}Le soldat se redresse et se met à ajuster son équipement.{/n} C'est un nouvel uniforme. Les gardes traversent une mauvaise passe, alors on nous distribue souvent ce qu'il reste... et la taille n'est pas toujours la bonne. »
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. {n}Le soldat se redresse et se met à ajuster son équipement.{/n} « C'est un nouvel uniforme. Les gardes traversent une mauvaise passe, alors on nous distribue souvent ce qu'il reste... et la taille n'est pas toujours la bonne. »

languages.text: “抱歉，大人！”{n}士兵挺直身子，调整装备。{/n}“这是一件新制服。这边的处境很艰难，所以我们经常剩下什么就分到什么……衣服总是不太合身。”
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

traits.locale_text: “抱歉，大人！”{n}士兵挺直身子，调整装备。{/n}“这是一件新制服。这边的处境很艰难，所以我们经常剩下什么就分到什么……衣服总是不太合身。”

languages.text: 「お詫び申し上げます、陛下！」{n}兵士は背筋を伸ばし、装備の調整に向かう。{/n}「新しい制服なんです。護衛隊は現在困難な状況にあり、私たちはしばしば残されたものを支給されることがあります…そして、必ずしも適切なサイズではないこともあります」
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

traits.locale_text: 「お詫び申し上げます、{mf||陛下|陛下}！」{n}兵士は背筋を伸ばし、装備の調整に向かう。{/n}「新しい制服なんです。護衛隊は現在困難な状況にあり、私たちはしばしば残されたものを支給されることがあります…そして、必ずしも適切なサイズではないこともあります」

languages.text: «¡Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}El soldado se levanta y va a ajustarse su equipo.{/n} «Es un uniforme nuevo. Los guardias están en una situación difícil ahora mismo, así que a menudo nos dan lo que sobra... y no siempre es la talla adecuada».
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}El soldado se levanta y va a ajustarse su equipo.{/n} «Es un uniforme nuevo. Los guardias están en una situación difícil ahora mismo, así que a menudo nos dan lo que sobra... y no siempre es la talla adecuada».

languages.text: "Bağışlayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!" {n}Asker, duruşunu dikleştirip üstüne başına çekidüzen veriyor.{/n} "Yeni bir üniforma. Muhafızlar şu sıra müşkül durumda. Bu yüzden arta kalanlarla yetiniyoruz ve... Her zaman uyan ölçülerde olmuyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}The soldier draws himself up and goes to adjust his gear.{/n} "It's a new uniform. The guards are in a difficult situation right now, so we often get issued whatever's left... and it isn't always the right size."

traits.locale_text: "Bağışlayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!" {n}Asker, duruşunu dikleştirip üstüne başına çekidüzen veriyor.{/n} "Yeni bir üniforma. Muhafızlar şu sıra müşkül durumda. Bu yüzden arta kalanlarla yetiniyoruz ve... Her zaman uyan ölçülerde olmuyorlar."
